go_data.justification: MAP4 is a microtubule-associated protein that can stabilize microtubules in vitro.
A muscle-specific isoform of MAP4 is expressed upon differentiation in a pattern very similar to that of MURF during myoblast differentiation.
MAP4 is a microtubule-associated protein, indicating its association with the cytoskeleton.
Overexpression of full- or partial-length MAP4 stabilizes microtubules.
